00028 class Graph {
00029     public:
00030         // --------
00031         // typedefs
00032         // --------
00033 
00034         typedef unsigned long vertex_descriptor;          // fix!
00035         typedef pair<vertex_descriptor, vertex_descriptor> edge_descriptor;            // fix!
00036 
00037         typedef unsigned long vertex_iterator;           // fix!
00038         typedef const edge_descriptor* edge_iterator;             // fix!
00039         typedef const vertex_descriptor* adjacency_iterator;        // fix!
00040 
00041         typedef size_t vertices_size_type;
00042         typedef size_t edges_size_type;
00043 
00044     public:
00045         // --------
00046         // add_edge
00047         // --------
00048 
00052         friend pair<edge_descriptor, bool> add_edge (vertex_descriptor vone, vertex_descriptor vtwo, Graph& theGraph) {
00053             edge_descriptor thisEdge = make_pair(vone, vtwo);
00054             bool success = false;
00055             if(find(theGraph.g[vone].begin(), theGraph.g[vone].end(), vtwo) == theGraph.g[vone].end())
00056             {
00057                 theGraph.g[vone].push_back(vtwo);
00058                 theGraph.my_edges.push_back(thisEdge);
00059                 success = true;
00060             }
00061             return make_pair(thisEdge, success);}
00062 
00063         // ----------
00064         // add_vertex
00065         // ----------
00066 
00070         friend vertex_descriptor add_vertex (Graph& theGraph) {
00071             theGraph.g.push_back(vector<vertex_descriptor>());
00072             theGraph.my_vertices.push_back(theGraph.g.size() - 1);
00073             return theGraph.g.size() - 1;}
00074 
00075         // -----------------
00076         // adjacent_vertices
00077         // -----------------
00078 
00082         friend pair<adjacency_iterator, adjacency_iterator> adjacent_vertices (vertex_descriptor v, const Graph& theGraph) {
00083             adjacency_iterator b = &*theGraph.g[v].begin();
00084             adjacency_iterator e = &*theGraph.g[v].end();
00085             return make_pair(b, e);}
00086 
00087         // ----
00088         // edge
00089         // ----
00090 
00094         friend pair<edge_descriptor, bool> edge (vertex_descriptor vone, vertex_descriptor vtwo, const Graph& theGraph) {
00095             edge_descriptor ed = make_pair(vone, vtwo);
00096             bool success = false;
00097             if(find(theGraph.g[vone].begin(), theGraph.g[vone].end(), vtwo) != theGraph.g[vone].end())
00098                 success = true;
00099             return make_pair(ed, success);}
00100 
00101         // -----
00102         // edges
00103         // -----
00104 
00110         friend pair<edge_iterator, edge_iterator> edges (const Graph& theGraph) {
00111             return make_pair(&*theGraph.my_edges.begin(), &*theGraph.my_edges.end());}
00112 
00113         // ---------
00114         // num_edges
00115         // ---------
00116 
00120         friend edges_size_type num_edges (const Graph& theGraph) {
00121             return theGraph.my_edges.size();}
00122 
00123         // ------------
00124         // num_vertices
00125         // ------------
00126 
00130         friend vertices_size_type num_vertices (const Graph& theGraph) {
00131             return theGraph.my_vertices.size();}
00132 
00133         // ------
00134         // source
00135         // ------
00136 
00140         friend vertex_descriptor source (edge_descriptor ed, const Graph& theGraph) {
00141             return ed.first;}
00142 
00143         // ------
00144         // target
00145         // ------
00146 
00150         friend vertex_descriptor target (edge_descriptor ed, const Graph& theGraph) {
00151             return ed.second;}
00152 
00153         // ------
00154         // vertex
00155         // ------
00156 
00160         friend vertex_descriptor vertex (vertices_size_type vindex, const Graph& theGraph) {
00161             return theGraph.my_vertices[vindex];}
00162 
00163         // --------
00164         // vertices
00165         // --------
00166 
00170         friend pair<vertex_iterator, vertex_iterator> vertices (const Graph& theGraph) {
00171             return make_pair(theGraph.my_vertices.begin(), theGraph.my_vertices.end());}
